sourcesContent:
<template ref="chatSpace">
  <IonList>
    <ChatItem @click="openModal"/>
    <ChatItem @click="openModal"/>
    <ChatItem @click="openModal"/>
  </IonList>
  <IonModal ref="chatModal">
    <IonHeader>
      <IonToolbar>
        <IonButtons slot="start">
          <IonButton @click="close">oh</IonButton>
        </IonButtons>
        <IonSearchbar></IonSearchbar>
        <IonButtons slot="end">
          <IonButton>
            <IonIcon :icon="notifications" color="tertiary"/>
            <IonBadge slot="end" color="danger">2</IonBadge>
          </IonButton>
        </IonButtons>
      </IonToolbar>
    </IonHeader>
  </IonModal>
</template>

<script>
/* eslint-disable vue/no-unused-components */
import {
  IonCard,
  IonCardHeader,
  IonCardSubtitle,
  IonCardTitle,
  IonIcon,
  IonCardContent,
  IonList,
  IonItem,
  modalController,
  IonModal,
} from '@ionic/vue';
import ChatItem from "@/components/ChatItem.vue";

export default {
  name: "ChatSpace",
  setup() {
    return {}
  },
  components: {
    IonCardSubtitle,
    IonIcon,
    IonCard,
    IonCardHeader,
    IonCardTitle,
    IonCardContent,
    IonItem,
    IonList,
    ChatItem,
    IonModal,
  },
  props: {},
  methods: {
    async openModal() {
      const modal = await modalController.create({
        component: IonModal,
        componentProps: {
          groupId: this.groupId,
        }
      });
      return await modal.present();
    },
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
